list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: put down, especially gently or carefully.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she laid the baby in his crib
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đặt em bé trong cũi của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: put down and set in position for use.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it is advisable to have your carpet laid by a professional
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nên uống thảm của bạn được đặt bởi một chuyên gia

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used with an abstract noun so that the phrase formed has the same meaning as the verb related to the noun used, e.g., “lay the blame on” means ‘to blame’.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she laid great stress on little courtesies
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đặt căng thẳng lớn cho những lời tán tỉnh nhỏ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a female bird, insect, reptile, or amphibian) produce (an egg) from inside the body.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Flamingos chỉ nằm một quả trứng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I'm going to lay a course for Ibiza harbor
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi sẽ đặt một khóa học cho cảng Ibiza

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the general appearance of an area, including the direction of streams, hills, and similar features.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the lay of the surrounding countryside
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lay của vùng nông thôn xung quanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the laying of eggs or the period during which they are laid.
a short lyric or narrative poem meant to be sung.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a minstrel recited a series of lays
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một minstrel đã đọc một loạt các lays

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: not ordained into or belonging to the clergy.
not having professional qualifications or expert knowledge, especially in law or medicine.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: lay and professional views of medicine
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lay và quan điểm chuyên nghiệp của y học
